hindi:
काल करे सो आज कर, आज करे सो अब।
पल में परलय होएगी, बहुरि करेगा कब।
english:
Kaal kare so aaj kar, aaj kare so ab.
Pal mein parlay hoyegi, bahuri karega kab.
translation: What you plan to do tomorrow, do today. What you plan to do today, do now. The world may end in a moment, when will you do it again?
